alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 12:23PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AREAS NEAR PRESCOTT IN YAVAPAI COUNTY THROUGH 100 PM MST... At 1222 PM MST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Fain Lake, or over Prescott Valley. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Prescott Valley, Prescott, Dewey-humboldt, Glassford Hill, Antelope Park, Prescott Airport, Willow Creek Reservoir, Granite Creek Park, Prescott Gateway Mall, Williamson, Fain Lake, Lynx Lake, Goldwater Lake, Watson Lake, Williamson Valley, Embry-Riddle University, Yavapai County Fairgrounds, Mountain Valley Park, and Downtown Prescott. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 311 and 325. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 330. State Route 69 between mile markers 281 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
